data: Most men have a sunny spot to which they look back in their existence, as most have an impossible future, to attain which all their energies are exerted, and their resources employed.
MOST men have a sunny spot to which they look back in their existence, as most have an impossible future, to attain which all their energies are exerted, and their resources employed.
Market Harborough, and Inside the Bar
Whyte-Melville, G. J. (George John), 1821-1878; Charlton, John, 1849-1917 [Illustrator]
